name: 15 Seconds!
description:
15 Seconds! Is a game where you find yourself scoring as high scores as possible in different tasks. But there is a twist: you have only 15 seconds to complete the task. 

This game was made for Games Plus Jam in only 3 days.

There are currently just 3 tasks in the game,  because I was unable to do anything during the first day of the jam.

If antivirus blocks the file, just turn it off, there is no chance that this game will harm your computer.

CONTROLS

Mouse and keyboard

OTHER

I know there are many good ways to improve the game,  but I am just learning Unity and programming. While this game may not look good for you,  I really like it,  because is the first game I have ever released,  so if you find any bugs or you dont like the gameplay,  please dont be rude to me and tell me in the comments what you dont like/where have you found the bug.

Have fun playing!
